divs: sighting detailsi going to keep this brief. i just wanted to report this because i feel as though it maybe helpful incase there is any other activity in the area. so i went outside to stargaze and listen to music on my phone when i see what appears to be two very dim dull red lights (to dim for a plane) that may or may not have been connected. flew over either in formation or connected at a sideways angle. it flew over very low and very fast. it cleared what i could see of the horizon in 3\5 seconds and i feel it was completely silent due to the altitude. i was shocked and stood right up after it happened. i would just like to add while growing up my father was a huge aviation buff ive been to many many air shows and have always lived around military or civilian airports.
Summary: very dull red lights that seemed as if they were connected zipped over head fast and low. out of sight in 3 to 5 seconds.
